trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Buffalo
There were no other sightings in Buffalo on or around September 17th 2004
divs: Sighting Detailsa starlike object in the same location for approx. four years visible on a clear(not cloudy) night in the Buffalo, NY area sky. does not move. is a constant white color. does not dim or brighten. when i stand with my arm straight up facing east, the object is approximately 20 degrees angle of my arm to the east. appears to be same longitude as my location. Does not change location through the night. observed without visual aid. Was brought to my attention as ufo by friend.
